summary: A test suite that validates the behavior and configuration options of a spatio‑temporal conditional UNet model, covering initialization, forward propagation, normalization groups, gradient checkpointing, attention slicing, various projection and embedding schemes, serialization, and xformers integration.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the spatio‑temporal UNet model for video or sequence generation pipelines, enabling safe deployment and maintenance in production AI systems.
